title: 188: How to Find Passion & Fulfill Your Purpose with Jay Shetty
description:
What does it take to discover your purpose? 

If you are struggling to find your passion and fulfill your purpose, this is an episode you can’t afford to miss.

We have my dear friend and author of Think Like a Monk, Jay Shetty, on the show today. Jay is a purpose coach, host of the #1 Podcast, “On Purpose,” and former monk on a mission to Make Wisdom Go Viral. 

In this episode, I speak with Jay about the difference between passion and purpose. He tells us that we should not wait for there to be a full picture of everything lining up perfectly before we take action. Jay talks about how passion and purpose are more like a puzzle, so we should start with what we have, where we are, with the tiniest piece of curiosity. 

*** Do you want to stay up to date with every new episode and get my brand new Kwik Brain Accelerator Program? Go to www.KwikBrain.com/podcast to get instant access. ***
